Anggota Parlemen Hong Kong Tiba-tiba Ditikam Usai Diberi Karangan Bunga
06 Nov 2019, 15:05 by Novi Christiastuti
Hong Kong - Seorang anggota parlemen Hong Kong yang dikenal pro-China, diserang oleh seorang pria bersenjatakan pisau. Akibat serangan pisau ini, sang anggota parlemen mengalami luka-luka dan harus dirawat di rumah sakit setempat.
Seperti dilansir Reuters dan AFP, Rabu (6/11/2019), anggota parlemen bernama Junius Ho dan asistennya, bersama si pelaku penikaman, dilarikan ke rumah sakit setempat. Ketiganya dilaporkan mengalami luka-luka dalam insiden yang terjadi pada Rabu (6/11) pagi waktu setempat.
Penyerangan ini terekam kamera amatir yang videonya diunggah secara online. Dalam video itu terlihat momen saat seorang pria yang membawa karangan bunga mendekati Ho saat dia sedang berkampanye di wilayah konstituennya di Tuen Mun, sebuah kota di pinggiran Hong Kong dekat perbatasan China.
Pria yang berpura-pura sebagai pendukung Ho itu memberikan karangan bunga kepadanya lalu meminta untuk foto bersama. Namun tiba-tiba dia mengeluarkan pisau dari tasnya dan menikam Ho di bagian dada. Ho dan asistennya dengan cepat melumpuhkan pria itu, yang bisa terdengar berteriak dalam bahasa Kanton: "Junius Ho, Anda sampah!"
Dituturkan seorang sumber kepolisian kepada AFP bahwa Ho mengalami luka tusukan di bagian dada sebelah kiri. Anggota parlemen berusia 57 tahun itu dalam kondisi sadar saat dibawa ke rumah sakit dengan ambulans.
Pelaku penusukan telah ditangkap. Kepolisian setempat tidak menyebut identitas pelaku penikaman. Motif di balik aksi penyerangan ini juga tidak diketahui pasti.

Hong Kong Member of Parliament Suddenly Stabbed After Being Wreathed
Nov 6 2019, 15:05 by Novi Christiastuti
Hong Kong - A Hong Kong lawmaker known to be pro-China, was attacked by a man armed with a knife. As a result of this knife attack, the MP suffered injuries and had to be treated at a local hospital.
As reported by Reuters and AFP on Wednesday (11/06/2019), a member of parliament named Junius Ho and his assistant, along with the stabbing perpetrator, were rushed to a local hospital. All three were reported injured in the incident that occurred on Wednesday (6/11) morning local time.
This attack was captured by an amateur camera whose videos were uploaded online. The video shows the moment when a man carrying a bouquet of flowers approached Ho while he was campaigning in his constituency in Tuen Mun, a city on the outskirts of Hong Kong near the Chinese border.
The man who pretended to be a supporter of Ho gave him a bouquet of flowers then asked for a group photo. But suddenly he took a knife from his bag and stabbed Ho in the chest. Ho and his assistant quickly paralyzed the man, who could be heard shouting in Cantonese: "Junius Ho, you trash!"
A police source told AFP that Ho had stab wounds to the left chest. The 57-year-old lawmaker was conscious when taken to hospital by ambulance.
The stabber was arrested. The local police did not mention the identity of the stabbing perpetrators. The motive behind the attack is also unknown.
